title: Reckless (Chris "The Glove" Taylor & David Storrs song)
text:
"Reckless" is a song by <a href="Chris%20Taylor%20%28music%20producer%29">Chris "The Glove" Taylor</a> & David Storrs, featuring <a href="Ice-T">Ice-T</a>. The song was released in 1984 on the <a href="soundtrack">soundtrack</a> of "<a href="Breakin%27%23Soundtrack">Breakin'</a>".
Legacy.
During an interview on the <a href="Friday%20Night%20with%20Jonathan%20Ross">Friday Night with Jonathan Ross</a> on 15 May 2009, rapper <a href="Eminem">Eminem</a> said "Reckless" was the first <a href="hip%20hop%20music">hip-hop</a> record he had ever heard; it inspired him to <a href="rap">rap</a>.
